item.title: By: click
item.dc:creator: click
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/penny-pinch/#comment-125">Sarah Cosper</a>.
OK FAIR. I can respect that.
In response in general, I have broken down and sacrificed part of my wine budget once to buy la mer's gel formulation. It was what I lusted after...but after using an entire jar of it over about two months, I find that both Biotherm's aquasource moisturizer (gel based) and Amore Pacific's regular gel based moisturizer do just as good a job. So lust no more! That stupid $90 moisturizer would probably make you break out after a week of using it, and you'll be back to an old standard.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sarah Cosper.

OK FAIR. I can respect that.

In response in general, I have broken down and sacrificed part of my wine budget once to buy la mer’s gel formulation. It was what I lusted after…but after using an entire jar of it over about two months, I find that both Biotherm’s aquasource moisturizer (gel based) and Amore Pacific’s regular gel based moisturizer do just as good a job. So lust no more! That stupid $90 moisturizer would probably make you break out after a week of using it, and you’ll be back to an old standard.

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/penny-pinch/#comment-124">click</a>.
If you can mix up something at home, do it, and I'll run it! That would be cool!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to click.

If you can mix up something at home, do it, and I’ll run it! That would be cool!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/penny-pinch/#comment-124">click</a>.
I want it because when I use it, it makes my skin soooo soft.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to click.

I want it because when I use it, it makes my skin soooo soft.

item.title: By: click
item.dc:creator: click
item.description:
WHY. Why do you want this? The ingredients list is almost all stuff I have in my pantry...except, PARABENS. WHAT!? In an "All natural" brand????? No thx.
Orange Blossom Honey Water (Mel, Aqua) , Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil (Olea europaea) , Stearic Acid , Cold Pressed Evening Primrose Oil (Oenothera biennis) , Cold Pressed Avocado Oil (Persea gratissima) , Glycerine , Extra Virgin Coconut Oil (Cocos nucifera) , Fresh Organic Lemon Juice (Citrus limonum) , Cold Pressed Organic Wheatgerm Oil (Triticum vulgare) , Fresh Organic Orange Juice (Citrus Aurantium dulcis) , Cold Pressed Organic Grapeseed Oil (Vitis vinifera) , Fresh Pineapple Juice (Ananas comosus) , Orange Flower Absolute (Citrus Dulcis) , Neroli Oil (Citrus amara) , Myrrh Resinoid (Commiphora myrrha) , Triethanolamine , Cetearyl Alcohol , *Geraniol , *Farnesol , *Limonene , *Linalool , Hydroxycitronellol , Fragrance , Methylparaben , Propylparaben
item.content:encoded:
WHY. Why do you want this? The ingredients list is almost all stuff I have in my pantry…except, PARABENS. WHAT!? In an “All natural” brand????? No thx.

Orange Blossom Honey Water (Mel, Aqua) , Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil (Olea europaea) , Stearic Acid , Cold Pressed Evening Primrose Oil (Oenothera biennis) , Cold Pressed Avocado Oil (Persea gratissima) , Glycerine , Extra Virgin Coconut Oil (Cocos nucifera) , Fresh Organic Lemon Juice (Citrus limonum) , Cold Pressed Organic Wheatgerm Oil (Triticum vulgare) , Fresh Organic Orange Juice (Citrus Aurantium dulcis) , Cold Pressed Organic Grapeseed Oil (Vitis vinifera) , Fresh Pineapple Juice (Ananas comosus) , Orange Flower Absolute (Citrus Dulcis) , Neroli Oil (Citrus amara) , Myrrh Resinoid (Commiphora myrrha) , Triethanolamine , Cetearyl Alcohol , *Geraniol , *Farnesol , *Limonene , *Linalool , Hydroxycitronellol , Fragrance , Methylparaben , Propylparaben
